title: T210 Perry Lipe Portrait SGC 40 SOLD
author: Piratedogcardshows

posts.post_title: T210 Perry Lipe Portrait SGC 40 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Very good example of Perry Lipe in Portrait form from the T210 set. Nice card for a Red Border collector or a T206 collector looking to add to his Hindu,Old Mill,Piedmont back run. Looking for T210/T209 in trade or 210.00 delivered. Contact me however is easiest for you. Thank you.


Add On..The case is not cracked. My scanner needed a little windex application!
Im not sure why the scans are coming out so small. I can send bigger ones via email if anyone is interested.
